item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, November 27, 2024 at 12:35 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Raspberry Pi CM5 is a faster, drop-in upgrade (120 points | 59 comments)
2. Show HN: App that asks 'why?' every time you unlock your phone (194 points | 105 comments)
3. The capacitor that Apple soldered incorrectly at the factory (233 points | 82 comments)

25. SSH Artwork (32 points | 3 comments)

27. Quark: Real-Time, High-Resolution, and General Neural View Synthesis (15 points | discuss)

29. We can mine asteroids for space food (147 points | 178 comments)
30. D-Link says it won't patch 60k older modems (205 points | 120 comments)
